title: How do I go about missing 12 rp for something i want to buy?
body:
i need 12 more rp for a hextech key and i was wondering if i have to spend 2.5 Euros for that or is there a way a rioter can give it to me for free because its only 12 rp. if its possible, how do i go about asking that and how do i make sure a rioter actually sees my problem?
thanks in advance,
Paying, EUNE.

replies.body:
You can send in a ticket requesting the once-per-lifetime rp request that riot does where they grant small amounts of rp to players that are just a tad bit short of making that one purchase they want to make.
It does help if you submit a drawing (no artistic talent required) of something you like in league. A champ, a monster maybe, or even the skin you're thinking of buying.


Make sure to pick “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and then “Games and Features -> General Questions”.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new


good luck
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

As *Wolfess* mentioned, we may be able to work something out if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on Twitter [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
